data.title: Washington University in St. Louis
data.meta_description: The list below contains preferred suppliers that offer contract pricing to Washington University staff and faculty.      Staff Discounts Spreadsheet    ...
data.text:
The list below contains preferred suppliers that offer contract pricing to Washington University staff and faculty.

While employees may use these contracts, employees may not use a university purchase order, procurement card, or other university payment method to acquire items for personal use.

In addition, Commerce Bank, and US Bank offer preferred banking services to Washington University staff and faculty. Click on their name to access each bank’s specific information.

Information about the St. Louis Community Credit Union is available at Stlouiscommunity.com.

For more information on preferred banking services, please contact the Treasury Office at 314-935-7750.

CustomGifts.efollett.com offers staff & faculty a broad selection of customized gifts and apparel. Visit their website to browse or request a special quote.

Use the password: bookstore.

Contact Rick Parker at 314-935-4561 with questions.

Staff and Students Now Receive FedEx Shipping Discounts

Washington University has three on-campus FedEx Office Print & Ship locations offering copying, document services, and shipping solutions. Effective January 2, 2018, WashU, St. Louis College of Pharmacy, and BJC Staff and Students are eligible for FedEx shipping discounts for personal use. Discounts are $5 off domestic ground shipments of at least $15 and $5 off domestic express shipments of a least $20. Packaging materials and international shipments do not qualify for this program. To utilize this discount you must show a valid ID badge at any of the WU on campus FedEx Office locations. FedEx shipping discounts cannot be applied at off-campus FedEx stores. For on-campus FedEx Office Print & Ship locations, store hours, and FAQs, please visit FedEx’s WUSTL website – FedEx WUSTL.
